name: Colorfast (Cascadia Games)
description:
Colorfast is a fast and fun retro arcade game, inspired by classics of the 80's. Play as a small chameleon who must constantly change colors to stay alive. Run into matching enemies to destroy them. Run into partial matching enemies to drain your color out of them. But don't run into mismatches unless you're ready to explode!

If you enjoy games like Mario Bros, Tetris, or any other arcade classics from the 80s, then you'll love Colorfast!
